Welcome to diaGrabber‘s documentation!¶

diaGrabber is a module to read, process and plot n-dimensional-data fully written in Python.

Download the source¶

You can diaGrabber on it’s sourceforge-site.

There is also a git-link to browse the code online.

Installation¶

To install diaGrabber on your system go to the main-‘diaGrabber’-Folder and type in a termial:

... in Linux:

sudo python setup.py install

... in Windows:

?????????

Use diaGrabber via:

import diaGrabber

in a Python script or shell.
